OrgName: LifeScan, Inc., and its wholly-owned subsidiaries: Johnson & Johnson Diabetes Institute, and Calibra Medical
activities: LifeScan and its subsidiaries receive personal information in various forms relating to personnel including prospective and former employees, research subjects, patients, investigators and staff, service providers, business partners, healthcare professionals, suppliers and industry experts.  These data are transferred from the EU to the United States and are used to carry out the company’s Human Resources, Clinical Operations, Sales/Marketing, Customer Service, and Compliant Handling/Adverse Events activities.   Please contact us with any questions about the way in which we process personal data at Office of Privacy (408) 956-4376 or email us at Privacy-LifeScan@its.jnj.com
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources, Clinical, Sales/Marketing, Customer Service, and Complaint Handling/Adverse Events
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (for human resources data); JAMs (for all other data)
